data.title: Kip Moore News ? Page 24
data.meta_description: Kip Moore has become one of the most promising newer artists in country music on the strength of his songwriting, singing and excellent live shows.  The Tifton, Ga...
data.text:
Kip Moore vs. Eric Church – The Showdown

Valentine's week begins with a battle of love songs after Kip Moore's new single 'Hey Pretty Girl' mopped up challenger Charlie Worsham and 'Could It Be' on Friday. Today and tonight on Taste of Country Nights radio the 'Somethin' 'Bout a Truck' singer will take on Grammy nominee Eric Church and his new song 'Like Jesus Does.'

Kip Moore vs. Charlie Worsham – The Showdown

Kip Moore's new song was the overwhelming favorite yesterday and last night during the Showdown on Taste of Country Nights radio. His new song 'Hey Pretty Girl' topped three-day champion Kenny Chesney and 'Pirate Flag' by a nearly two-to-one margin. The ballad will go up against the debut single from Charlie Worsham on Friday.

Kenny Chesney vs. Kip Moore – The Showdown

Country newcomers Parmalee did all they could to knock Kenny Chesney and his new song 'Pirate Flag' from the Showdown winners circle on Wednesday, but in the end, fans of the superstar were just too strong. That makes four straight wins for Chesney's new single. Today and tonight on Taste of Country Nights radio, the song will battle the new single by Kip Moore.

Toby Keith Trumpets 2013 Hammer Down Tour Dates

This summer, Toby Keith will lay down the hammer. The popular crooner has lined up 20 dates for his just-announced 2013 Hammer Down Tour, which will take off in June.

Kip Moore Sells Out Boston Show in 20 Minutes

It looks like 2013 is off to a running start for Kip Moore. The singer continues to sell out shows, and at a rapid clip. His Boston show, which takes place on March 23 at the House of Blues, sold out in only 20 minutes yesterday morning (Feb. 1), moving over 2,500 tickets in all. Clearly, the fans in Beantown are excited for Moore's show and gobbled up the tickets as fast as they could.

Kip Moore, ‘Hey Pretty Girl’ – ToC Critic’s Pick [Listen]

'Hey Pretty Girl' is the signature track from Kip Moore's remarkable 'Up All Night' album. The singer slows down the tempo and proves himself to be one of the most emotionally complete artists in the genre.

Kip Moore Brings ‘Beer Money,’ ‘Something ‘Bout a Truck’ to the 2012 ACAs in Las Vegas

Florida Georgia Line took the stage at the 2012 American Country Awards to introduce Kip Moore to a jam-packed arena in Las Vegas on Monday night (Dec. 10). Moore played a medley of 'Somethin' 'Bout A Truck' and 'Beer Money' for the excited audience.

Brantley Gilbert, Kip Moore + More Are New Faces of Country Music for 2013

After much consideration and voting, the Country Radio Broadcasters (CBR) have come to a final decision about which country music newcomers will make up the 2013 New Faces showcase, which will be held next year during Country Radio Seminar (CRS).

Brantley Gilbert Extends Hell on Wheels Tour Into 2013, Adds Kip Moore to Lineup

Because his first headlining trek has been such a sales success, Brantley Gilbert has decided to extend the Hell on Wheels Tour with a second leg, which will start in 2013.
